projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A real-time task management application with collaborative features. Users can create projects, assign tasks, set deadlines, and track progress in real-time.

projects.title: Social Media Dashboard
projects.description: Analytics dashboard for social media metrics and engagement. Visualize data with interactive charts and generate detailed reports.
